contents.contents: Walk along the “Rue du Palais” until you reach the Chatel Square. Turn right into the “Rue Saint Thibault”.
The name of a famous character keeps popping up in Provins.

question.contents: Who brought back the rose from the crusades?

explanations.contents: Provins is the capital of the rose. It is said to have been brought back from the crusades by Thibault de Champagne.
